description.value:
The greatest huntresses need not wait until their hunts are over to bask in the bounties of Etheirys. You draw an arrow (or other ammunition), whisper a short invocation over it, and then Strike with a ranged weapon. The arrow becomes a bolt of nature energy, changing its damage to your choice of spirit or earth and granting it the effects of the @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.equipment-srd.Item.JQdwHECogcTzdd8R]{Ghost Touch} materia.

When the arrow Strikes its target, it draws forth vines from below to wrap around the target's limbs, imposing a -10-foot circumstance penalty to its Speeds for [[/r 2d4 #rounds]]{2d4 rounds} or i@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.eIcWbB5o3pP6OIMe]{Immobilizing} it if the Strike was a critical hit. The target can untangle itself by spending an Interact action to break free.
